Title: Creates the empire state digital gaming media production credit
Summary: Creates the empire state digital gaming media production credit for a taxpayer which is a digital gaming media production entity engaged in qualified digital gaming media production or who is a sole proprietor of or a member of a partnership, which is a digital gaming media production in qualified digital gaming media production; requires the empire state development corporation to file a biannual report with the director of the division of the budget and the chairpersons of the assembly ways and means committee and the senate finance committee; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Add §45, amd §§210-B & 606, Tax L; add §242, Ec Dev L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the economic development law, in relation to the creation of the empire state digital gaming media production credit; and providing for the repeal of certain provisions upon expiration thereof
